channel.title: Michael Jordan on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Michael Jordan on TechnoStreet

item.title: “I Don’t Know If Your Question Is About Michael Jackson”: When Pele Mistook Michael Jordan for the ‘$500 Million Worth Debt Star’
item.description: “I Don’t Know If Your Question Is About Michael Jackson”: When Pele Mistook Michael Jordan for the ‘$500 Million Worth Debt Star’ The name Pele has become synonymous with success of Brazilian soccer.

item.title: “If you’re not narcissistic or an egomaniac, I wonder…”: Michael Jordan Gets Unorthodox Praises from Joe Rogan
item.description: “If you’re not narcissistic or an egomaniac, I wonder…”: Michael Jordan Gets Unorthodox Praises from Joe Rogan Throughout his career, Michael Jordan has drawn comparisons to a lot of people from a lot of backgrounds but Joe Rogan thinks he is akin to a ruthless army general and makes an earnest attempt to dissect his mentality.
